result.title: ENGLISH Blogs by Red,Yellow,Violet coders
result.content:
Hello,

I see that there are many Chinese blogs by GMs,IGMs, Yellow coders where they discuss the problems they have solved and blog about them (how they arrived at the solution, their codes etc.) I have heard that they are very helpful.

Are there any similar good blogs in ENGLISH that I can follow (which has the solution approach, code etc.)?

PS: Google translate of the chinese blogs is not helping much, so. :P

Thanks!
